name: UXFolio Case Study Template (Beta)
description:
Draft, organize, and experiment with your document’s structure more rapidly in Figma before pubslihing final work to UXFolio.


This template allows you to leverage certain Figma functionality that currently isn’t available directly on UXFolio, including the ability to:

  • Zoom out to see your entire document
  • Paste screencaps of other case studies next to your draft as reference points
  • Drag content sections up and down in real time
  • Quickly undo and redo changes to layout and content order


Other features include:

  • Ability to apply different layout selections to content without recreating it
  • Image placeholders you can write ideas into to help maintain your writing flow
  • Ability to optimize image size and cropping based on your layout choices
  • A “Draft” effect to help track draft vs final content


The template uses Auto Layout & Variants to accurately recreate UXFolio’s layouts & customization options (and also includes short instructions) so you can rapidly experiment with your document structure without worrying about feasibility on the actual site.


*This template is still a work in progress - if you encounter bugs, potential areas for improvement, or anything that specifically made you say "no thanks!" and move on, I'd love to hear about them in the comments!
